dependent_to.description: Herwig is a multi-purpose particle physics event generator.
dependent_to.name: herwig3

dependent_to.description:
Sherpa is a Monte Carlo event generator for the Simulation of High-
Energy Reactions of PArticles in lepton-lepton, lepton-photon, photon-
photon, lepton-hadron and hadron-hadron collisions.
dependent_to.name: sherpa

dependent_to.description:
WHIZARD is a program system designed for the efficient calculation of
multi-particle scattering cross sections and simulated event samples.
dependent_to.name: whizard

description:
The OpenLoops 2 program is a fully automated implementation of the Open
Loops algorithm combined with on-the-fly reduction methods, which allows
for the fast and stable numerical evaluation of tree and one-loop matrix
elements for any Standard Model process at NLO QCD and NLO EW.
name: openloops

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Number of parallel jobs to run. Set to 1 if compiling a large numberof processes (e.g. lcg.coll)
variants.name: num_jobs

variants.description: Processes to install. See https://openloops.hepforge.org/process_library.php?repo=public for details
variants.name: processes
